Detailed Description

template<class T, class Metric>
struct CoverTree< T, Metric >::LinkData

Object that tracks the iteration through a Node's list of children.

Some cover tree operations must iterate through several Node's children simultaneously.

Definition at line 47 of file covertree.hh.

double  d 
) [inline]

Construct a new LinkData iteration.

Parameters:
node The node through whose children to iterate.
d A distance from node->x that governs how long the iteration is relevant to a particular query or operation.
